name: karneval - gareki dashboard theme
description: this is a simplistic karneval tumblr theme. it includes a simple background picture of gareki and a home icon similar to the manga's logo. examples: home icon | background | full dash

user.name: nfjk
user.about: questions, concerns, requests, or anything else can be sent to my tumblr ask and i'll reply right away. thanks!! (((i change my url a lot so if that link below doesn't work check here.)))

additional_info: i'm new at this and not the best with coding so if you notice any issues or if you have any questions regarding this or my other dashboard theme feel free to message me on tumblr :~)) if you don't know how to remove the home icon if you don't want it/it interferes with another style installed i can help you with that too! UPDATE 11/14: i stopped being lazy and finally got the actual butterfly that's used in the logo n__n you can find that style here. i have other karneval styles on my page if you're interested ^^
